substitution.copyText: Ham. Where is this murderer, he kneels and prays, | And now I'll do't, and so he goes to heaven, | And so am I reveng'd? that would be scann'd; | He kill'd my father; and for that | I his sole son send him | To heaven: | Why this is a reward, -- not revenge:
